response.overview: In this unaired pilot movie, Billy Blazes and the other heroes are busy rescuing everything from a pet parrot to a baby whale when Roger Houston signals the home base from his orbiting space station. A volcano is about to erupt off the coast of Paradise Point...  The Rescue Heroes go mobile--and not a moment too soon. Prof. Noah Lott, a naturalist and his wife are camped close to the volcano--and their kids are off exploring, far from safety. Their only hope is the Rescue Heroes!
response.title: Rescue Heroes: Lava Alarm
